itemDisplayName: Deploy a trusted launch capable Windows virtual machine
description: This template allows you to deploy a trusted launch capable Windows virtual machine using a few different options for the Windows version, using the latest patched version. By default, this will deploy an Standard_D2_v3 size virtual machine in the resource group location and return the FQDN of the virtual machine.
summary: This template takes a minimum amount of parameters and deploys a trusted launch capable Windows virtual machine, using the latest patched version.
